title: Blunder Machine - Writeup
snippet: IntroductionBlunder machine released on 30 May 2020 on HackTheBox platform and created by egotisticalSW.It’s nice machine which hosted CMS named Bludit. So let’s move forward and p4wn this awesome box.This blog is meant for educational purposes only.Port &amp; Service Enumerationroot@kali:~su...
